DOC.detailed_description: Surgical complication significant cause morbidity mortality . Surgical complication account 40 % hospital complication . Complications adverse event also become increasingly important measure health care quality . Many physician practice notice surge patient seek care end year compare time year . Patients meet insurance deductible likely eager proceed elective procedure . Patients meet deductible likely utilize healthcare resource health problem , procedure perform year . Thus may potential sicker complicate patient undergo surgery end year compare time year . Prior study often evaluate `` July effect '' begin new academic year teaching hospital . Not new intern involve patient care trainee level participate new role . Several prior study find high morbidity mortality rate July-August compare April-June . There paucity research evaluate measure month November-December . Identifying patient high risk perioperative morbidity important help prevent surgical complication low healthcare cost . Proper patient selection appropriate timing elective procedure positively impact adverse outcome . This study retrospective cohort study investigate whether difference perioperative morbidity elective surgery base time year surgery perform . The result project could impact counsel patient regard timing surgery base calendar month . This could also help implement change system base care provide regard insurance deductible maximum .
